name: Night Mare (Gaming Blobfish)
description:
Travel between the waking and nightmare world to save your family from the evil Mare.

STORY

Mare (folklore): a malicious entity that rides on people's chests while they sleep, bringing on nightmares. But what if a Mare's powers could transcend the nightmare world - endangering the lives of the waking people?

You play as a loving husband and father of two children who now has to face this reality. An evil Mare has taken your family's souls hostage and it is up to you to save them, lest the Mare gets impatient and decides to feed its hunger.

ARTIFACTS

Everyone has that one special object that carries significant meaning for them. It might be a toy car that you built with your dad, a teddy bear that's kept you company for many stormy nights, or simply a bouquet of flowers gifted to you by your husband. These artifacts are parts of your soul, and the Mare would gladly feed on those. Find each of your family member's artifacts as an offering to the Mare, and maybe he will let you take back your family's souls.

ENEMIES

However, it's not that easy. The Mare wants to make this task more challenging. It has placed its henchmen eyeballs around the house to guard it. Don't let them catch you, or they will summon the Mare itself.

You better hide quickly if you dare summon the Mare because you surely won't be able to outrun it. Hide in closets, behind tables, even in the bathroom if need be. Your family's lives are at stake. And make sure you can hear the Mare coming; if you can already see it, it might be too late.

CREDITS

Story : Adam

Assistant Story : Gabriel

Programming : Adam

Level Design : Adam

Assistant Level Design : Adam

3D Models : Gabriel

Voice Acting : Adam

Graphic Design : Adam

Assistant Graphic Design : Gabriel
